flawed_nl_solution:
Thor sold 200/10=<<200/10=20.0>>20.0 stuffed animals.
Jake sold 20.0+10=<<20.0+10=30.0>>30.0 stuffed animals.
Quincy sold 200-30.0= <<200-30.0=107.0>>107.0 more stuffed animals than Jake.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 170.0, not 107.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
